name: Skabroso
description:
This game was developed in Meeting Jam 2016(Gamux - Unicamp).

It's a top-down stealth game in which the objective is leave the room. For this, you should open doors, know the exact time to go and not be caught by aliens. Some of the Aliens shoot, beware!

For now, it's only 4 levels.

Corrected Aliens speed.

I hope you enjoy !!!
